title: Hypelia Castle - Evil【Hypelia城堡——邪恶】
author: crj125
txt_content:
本帖最后由 crj125 于 2014-2-12 12:41 编辑 




作者的介绍(不是我说的）
Hi everyone!
This is a project I'm working on recently in single player. This is the evil version of the castle Hypelia. There's going to be another version in the future if you like this one.
The castle was made by me only and it took me 2 weeks.


The renders was made with Chunky and the resource pack is Conquest
中文翻译
嗨大家好!这是一个项目我正在最近在单人游戏。这是邪恶的城堡Hypelia版本。将会有另一个版本在未来如果你喜欢这一个。城堡是由我只和我花了2周。呈现由厚实,资源包是征服下载地址貌似图挂了我去开光影截图
